name: The Pooping Meowmeow
description:
Have you ever thought about being a naughty Meowmeow and messing up the place by pooping everywhere? Released after "Cat Owner Simulator", here's a new game with our old friend Meowmeow! DOWNLOAD and ENJOY it, now!

Special thanks to Kurt Sha, who's the credit of the background music, amazing music!

P.S. [WASD] to move, [Space] to jump, [Left Click] to poop, [Right Click] to super jump, which costs a poop bullet energy!

P.P.S. If you're using a joycon, the [Right Bumper] is  for super jump!
